mapper.sql: UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, APPLICANT applicant, IDTYPE idtype, IDCARD idcard, indu_comm_reg_num induCommRegNum, organizational_code organizationalCode, UNIFIED_SOCIAL_CREDIT_CODE unifiedSocialCreditCode, TAXPAYER_NUM taxpayerNum, CREDIT_FLAG_NUM creditFlagNum, CONTACT contact, MOBILE mobile, EMAIL email, APPLICANT_DISTRICT applicantDistrict, APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE applicantDetailSite, IDREPRESENTATIVE idrepresentative, IDMOBILE idmobile, IDNO idno, IS_DELETED isDeleted, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, IS_PRIMARY_UNIT isPrimaryUnit, PARENT_ID parentId, UNIT_INFO_SEQ unitInfoSeq, LOGIN_NAME loginName, UNIT_TYPE unitType, LOGIN_PWD loginPwd, MANAGEMENT_SCOPE managementScope, REGISTERED_CAPITAL registeredCapital, REGISTER_AUTHORITY registerAuthority, UNIT_NATURE unitNature, POSTAL_CODE postalCode, IS_IM_UNIT isImUnit, IMG_URL imgUrl, IS_OWNER_UNIT isOwnerUnit, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, IS_GD isGd, AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag

${alias}.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, ${alias}.APPLICANT applicant, ${alias}.IDTYPE idtype, ${alias}.IDCARD idcard, ${alias}.indu_comm_reg_num induCommRegNum, ${alias}.organizational_code organizationalCode, ${alias}.unified_social_credit_code unifiedSocialCreditCode, ${alias}.TAXPAYER_NUM taxpayerNum, ${alias}.CREDIT_FLAG_NUM creditFlagNum, ${alias}.CONTACT contact, ${alias}.MOBILE mobile, ${alias}.EMAIL email, ${alias}.APPLICANT_DISTRICT applicantDistrict, ${alias}.APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE applicantDetailSite, ${alias}.IDREPRESENTATIVE idrepresentative, ${alias}.IDMOBILE idmobile, ${alias}.IDNO idno, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_PRIMARY_UNIT isPrimaryUnit, ${alias}.PARENT_ID parentId, ${alias}.UNIT_INFO_SEQ unitInfoSeq, ${alias}.LOGIN_NAME loginName, ${alias}.UNIT_TYPE unitType, ${alias}.LOGIN_PWD loginPwd, ${alias}.MANAGEMENT_SCOPE managementScope, ${alias}.REGISTERED_CAPITAL registeredCapital, ${alias}.REGISTER_AUTHORITY registerAuthority, ${alias}.UNIT_NATURE unitNature, ${alias}.POSTAL_CODE postalCode, ${alias}.IS_IM_UNIT isImUnit, ${alias}.IMG_URL imgUrl, ${alias}.IS_OWNER_UNIT isOwnerUnit, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_UNIT_INFO where UNIT_INFO_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_UNIT_INFO WHERE PARENT_ID = #{unitInfoId} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_UNIT_INFO WHERE UNIT_INFO_ID = ( SELECT PROJ_INFO_ID FROM AEA_UNIT_PROJ WHERE UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId} ) AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_UNIT_INFO WHERE IS_DELETED = '0'
AND (APPLICANT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') or unified_social_credit_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%'))
AND ROOT_ORG_ID=#{rootOrgId}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_UNIT_INFO (UNIT_INFO_ID, APPLICANT, IDTYPE, IDCARD, indu_comm_reg_num, organizational_code, unified_social_credit_code,TAXPAYER_NUM,CREDIT_FLAG_NUM, CONTACT, MOBILE, EMAIL, APPLICANT_DISTRICT, APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE, IDREPRESENTATIVE, IDMOBILE, IDNO, IS_DELETED, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, IS_PRIMARY_UNIT, PARENT_ID, UNIT_INFO_SEQ, LOGIN_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, LOGIN_PWD, MANAGEMENT_SCOPE, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, REGISTER_AUTHORITY, UNIT_NATURE, POSTAL_CODE, IS_IM_UNIT, IMG_URL, IS_OWNER_UNIT,ROOT_ORG_ID,IS_GD,AUDIT_FLAG) values (#{unitInfoId}, #{applicant}, #{idtype}, #{idcard}, #{induCommRegNum} , #{organizationalCode} , #{unifiedSocialCreditCode} ,#{taxpayerNum},#{creditFlagNum}, #{contact}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{applicantDistrict}, #{applicantDetailSite}, #{idrepresentative}, #{idmobile}, #{idno}, #{isDeleted}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{isPrimaryUnit}, #{parentId}, #{unitInfoSeq}, #{loginName}, #{unitType}, #{loginPwd}, #{managementScope}, #{registeredCapital}, #{registerAuthority}, #{unitNature}, #{postalCode}, #{isImUnit}, #{imgUrl}, #{isOwnerUnit},#{rootOrgId},#{isGd},#{auditFlag})
mapper.update:
update AEA_UNIT_INFO
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
APPLICANT = #{applicant},
IDTYPE = #{idtype},
IDCARD = #{idcard},
indu_comm_reg_num = #{induCommRegNum},
organizational_code = #{organizationalCode},
unified_social_credit_code = #{unifiedSocialCreditCode},
TAXPAYER_NUM = #{taxpayerNum},
CREDIT_FLAG_NUM = #{creditFlagNum},
CONTACT = #{contact},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
EMAIL = #{email},
APPLICANT_DISTRICT = #{applicantDistrict},
APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE = #{applicantDetailSite},
IDREPRESENTATIVE = #{idrepresentative},
IDMOBILE = #{idmobile},
IDNO = #{idno},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
IS_PRIMARY_UNIT = #{isPrimaryUnit},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
UNIT_INFO_SEQ = #{unitInfoSeq},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType},
LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd},
MANAGEMENT_SCOPE = #{managementScope},
REGISTERED_CAPITAL = #{registeredCapital},
REGISTER_AUTHORITY = #{registerAuthority},
UNIT_NATURE = #{unitNature},
POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode},
IS_IM_UNIT = #{isImUnit},
IMG_URL = #{imgUrl},
IS_OWNER_UNIT = #{isOwnerUnit},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
IS_GD = #{isGd}
AUDIT_FLAG = #{auditFlag}
where UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId}

update AEA_UNIT_INFO
IS_DELETED = '1'
where UNIT_INFO_ID IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, auli.IS_ADMINISTRATORS isAdministrators FROM AEA_UNIT_INFO aui LEFT JOIN aea_unit_linkman auli ON aui.UNIT_INFO_ID = auli.UNIT_INFO_ID WHERE auli.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanId} AND auli.IS_BIND_ACCOUNT = '1' AND ( aui.IS_DELETED = '0' OR aui.IS_DELETED IS NULL )

SELECT
FROM AEA_UNIT_INFO aui
LEFT JOIN AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN aul
ON aui.UNIT_INFO_ID=aul.UNIT_INFO_ID
WHERE EXISTS( SELECT * FROM AEA_UNIT_PROJ AUP1 LEFT JOIN(
SELECT API1.PROJ_INFO_ID FROM AEA_PROJ_INFO API1 LEFT JOIN AEA_APPLYINST_PROJ APP1 ON API1.PROJ_INFO_ID=APP1.PROJ_INFO_ID WHERE APP1.APPLYINST_ID =#{applyinstId} ) TEMP1 ON AUP1.PROJ_INFO_ID=TEMP1.PROJ_INFO_ID WHERE AUI.UNIT_INFO_ID=AUP1.UNIT_INFO_ID and aup1.is_deleted='0' ) AND AUL.LINKMAN_INFO_ID=#{linkmanInfoId}
select AUI.APPLICANT,AIUS.price FROM AEA_UNIT_INFO aui left join AEA_IM_UNIT_SERVICE AIUS ON AUI.UNIT_INFO_ID =AIUS.UNIT_INFO_ID where AIUS.ITEM_VER_ID = #{itemVerId}

select aui.unit_info_id, aui.APPLICANT,count(aiub.is_won_bid) bidCount,aui.create_time,unititem.itemname from AEA_UNIT_INFO aui left join AEA_IM_UNIT_BIDDING aiub on aiub.unit_info_id = aui.unit_info_id and aiub.is_won_bid = '1' left join (select aius.unit_service_id,
wm_concat(aib.item_name) itemname
GROUP_CONCAT(aib.item_name SEPARATOR ',' ) itemname
from aea_im_unit_service aius inner join aea_item_ver aiv on aiv.item_ver_id = aius.item_ver_id inner join aea_item_basic aib on aib.item_ver_id = aiv.item_ver_id group by aius.unit_service_id) unititem on unititem.unit_service_id = aui.unit_info_id
aui.unit_info_id in (select unit_info_id from AEA_IM_UNIT_SERVICE aius where aius.unit_service_id in(#{serviceType}) )
and aui.APPLICANT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{agencyName}),'%')
group by aui.unit_info_id,aui.APPLICANT,aui.create_time,unititem.itemname order by aui.create_time ${stimeOrder} ,count(aiub.is_won_bid) ${countOrder}

SELECT linkman.*,AUL1.UNIT_INFO_ID FROM AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman LEFT JOIN AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN AUL1 ON AUL1.LINKMAN_INFO_ID=linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID where AUL1.UNIT_INFO_ID=#{unitInfoId} AND linkman.is_deleted!='1'

select
from AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN aul left join aea_unit_info aui on aul.unit_info_id=aui.unit_info_id where aul.linkman_info_id=#{linkmanInfoId}

select from ( select DISTINCT aup.unit_info_id from aea_unit_proj aup where aup.proj_info_id=#{projInfoId} and aup.is_owner ='1' and aup.is_deleted='0') gg ,aea_unit_info aui where gg.unit_info_id = aui.unit_info_id and aui.UNIT_TYPE=#{unitType}

select
from AEA_UNIT_INFO WHERE IS_DELETED = '0'
AND (APPLICANT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') or unified_social_credit_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%'))
AND ROOT_ORG_ID=#{rootOrgId}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
